title: Brazda, Čučer-Sandevo
text:
Brazda () is a <a href="village">village</a> in the <a href="Municipalities%20of%20North%20Macedonia">municipality</a> of <a href="%C4%8Cu%C4%8Der-Sandevo%20Municipality">Čučer-Sandevo</a>, <a href="North%20Macedonia">North Macedonia</a>.
Demographics.
According to the 2002 census, the village had a total of 480 inhabitants. Ethnic groups in the village include:
